Posts.Content: Amdj wrote: I am 42 years old and over the last 3 mths I noticed that my rights breast has or is growing. It's almost double my left breast. I went to the dr who did a physical exam. She notice the top quadrant of my right breast is definitely more dense and fibrous than the left. I went for a mammogram and U/S. the results came back normal ; however the receptionist at the DR office said the US noticed several lymph nodes and numerous clusters of cystswithin the right breast but it's healthy and I need to go back in 6 mths for a follow up US. What does this mean? Why would this happen to only one breast? HOw can you tell that it's healthy without a biopsy? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: One breast doubled in size. Amdj wallan
